name: Covert Order
description: Trigger: foe enters, exits, or initiates combat with ally in a space within Range 0-1 of this unit’s deployed battalion unit. This unit may use an “Order” art as a reaction, following the same restrictions as adjutant reactions. (Battalion units use a reaction with "Trigger: employer uses 'Covert Order'" rather than an action to employ the "Order" art’s effects.)
